K01prmosufu:0: (PrMoSū_Mū-LCh)Pār.2 yaḥ punar bhikṣur grāmagatam araṇyagataṃ vā pareṣāṃ adattaṃ
K01prmosufu:1: steyasaṃkhyātam ādadīta yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā rājamātro vā hanyād
K01prmosufu:2: vā badhnīyād vā pravāsayed vā evaṃ cainaṃ vadet tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa bālo 'si mūḍho 'si
K01prmosufu:3: steyo 'sīty evaṃrūpaṃ bhikṣur adattaṃ ādadāvaḥ ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājayiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ
K01prmosufu:4: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pār.3 yaḥ punar bhikṣur manuṣyaṃ vā manuṣyavigrahaṃ vā svahastaṃ saṃcintya
K01prmosufu:5: jīvitād vyaparopayec chastraṃ vainam ādhārayec chastrādhārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeta maraṇāya
K01prmosufu:6: vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayed evaṃ cainaṃ vaded dhaṃ bhoḥ puruṣo
K01prmosufu:7: kiṃ te anena pāpakenāśucinā durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te bhoḥ puruṣa jīvitād varam iti cintānumataiś
K01prmosufu:8: cittasaṃkalpair anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet
K01prmosufu:9: sa ca tena kālaṃ kuryād ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ //
K01prmosufu:10: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pār.4 yaḥ punar bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann asantam asaṃvidyamānam.
K01prmosufu:11: ... viśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā pratijānīyād idaṃ jānāmīdaṃ
K01prmosufu:12: paśyāmīti sa pareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno vā asamanuyujyamāno vā āpanno viśuddhiprekṣy
K01prmosufu:13: evaṃ vaded ajānaty evāham āyuṣmanto 'vocaṃ jānāmīty apaśyann evā ... ayam api bhikṣuḥ
K01prmosufu:15: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamam āpattim
K01prmosufu:16: adhyāpatya na labhate bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvāsaṃ bhogaṃ vā yathāpūrvaṃ tathāpaścāt
K01prmosufu:18: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi ... dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad
K01prmosufu:19: Uddāna SA.4-13: ... caryā sāṃcaritraṃ kuṭikā mahallakaḥ amūlaka leśika saṃghabhedas tasyānuvarti kuladūṣaka daurvacasya ...
K01prmosufu:20: ime khalv āyuṣmantas trayodaśa saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti
K01prmosufu:22: (PrMoSū-LCh)SA.2 yaḥ punar bhikṣur avalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ samāpadyeta hastagrahaṇaṃ vā bāhu ...
K01prmosufu:24: dvau trīn vā pātrapūrān pratigṛhya bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā santo bhikṣavaḥ saṃvibhaktavyā ātmanā ca paribhoktavyaṃ ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ //
K01prmosufu:25: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.34 yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhuktavān pravāritaḥ akṛtaniriktaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuṃjīta vā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:26: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.35 yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ bhuktavantaṃ pravāritam akṛta
K01prmosufu:27: atiriktena khādanīyabhojanīyenātyarthaṃ pravārayed idam āyuṣmaṃ khāda idaṃ bhuṃkṣva
K01prmosufu:28: ity āsādanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur āsādito bhaviṣyaty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:31: glānasamayaḥ karmasamayo 'dhvasamayo nāvādhirohaṇaṃ mahāsamājaḥ śramaṇabhaktam ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ //
K01prmosufu:32: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.37 yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuṃjīta vā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:33: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.38 yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃnihitaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuṃjīta vā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:34: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.39 yaḥ punar bhikṣur adattaṃ mukhābhyavahāryam āhāram āhared anyatrodakadantakāṣṭhāt pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:35: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.40 yāni tāni bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇītabhojanāny akhyātāni tadyathā kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ matsyo māṃsavallūrā //
K01prmosufu:36: yaḥ punar bhikṣur imāny evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītabhojanāny ātmārtham aglānaḥ parakulebhyo vijñāpya khāded bhuṃjītā vā pāyantikā // //
K01prmosufu:38: saprāṇabhojane sthānaṃ niṣadyācela senayā dvirātraudyūṣikāṃ gacchet prahārodgūra duṣṭhulāḥ // //
K01prmosufu:39: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.41 yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:40: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.42 yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule anupraskadyāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:41: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.43 yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule rahasi praticchanne 'titiṣṭhet pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:42: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.44 yaḥ punar bhikṣur acelakāya vā acelikāyai vā parivrājakāya vā parivrājikāyai vāstamāstaṃ ?
K01prmosufu:44: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.45 yaḥ punar bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmet pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:45: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.46 syāt khalu bhikṣoḥ tadrūpaḥ pratyaya udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ
K01prmosufu:46: dvirātraparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravastavyaṃ tata uttari vipravaset
K01prmosufu:48: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.47 dvirātram api ced bhikṣus tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravasann udyūṣikāṃ vā gacched dhvajāgraṃ vā balāgraṃ vā senāvyūham anīkasaṃdarśanaṃ vā pratyanubhavet pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:49: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.48 yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāraṃ dadyāt pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:50: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.49 yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāram udgūrayed antatas talaśaktikā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:51: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.50 yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣor duṣṭhūlām āpattiṃ praticchādayet pāyantikā // //
K01prmosufu:52: uddānaṃ sparśo jyotiś chando 'nupasaṃpādanena dharmavādī ca śramaṇoddeśo daurvarṇyaṃ ratnaparidāhasamayaś ca // //
K01prmosufu:53: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.51 yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded ehy āyuṣman kulāny upasaṃkramiṣyāvaḥ
K01prmosufu:54: tatra te dāpayiṣyāmi praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāvad āpta sa tasyādāpayitvā tataḥ
K01prmosufu:55: paścād eva vaded gaccha tvam āyuṣman na cet tvayā sārdhaṃ sparśo bhavati kathāyāṃ
K01prmosufu:56: vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā api tv ekākina eva me sparśo bhavati kathāyāṃ vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā ity
K01prmosufu:57: udyojanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur udyojito bhaviṣyatīty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:58: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.52 yaḥ punar bhikṣur ātmārtham aglāno vitapanaprekṣī jyotiḥ samavadadhyāt samavadhāpayed vā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:59: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.53 yaḥ punar bhikṣur dhārmike saṃghakaraṇīye bhikṣoś chandaṃ datvā
K01prmosufu:60: paścād abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto nāttamanāḥ kṣepadharmam āpadyeta āhara bhikṣo
K01prmosufu:62: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.54 yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ dvirātrād ūrdhvaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ prakalpayet pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:63: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.55 yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam
K01prmosufu:64: ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā tenāpratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti
K01prmosufu:65: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmann evaṃ vocas tathāhaṃ bhagavato
K01prmosufu:66: dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā
K01prmosufu:67: nālam antarāyāyeti mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣu na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ
K01prmosufu:68: na ca punar bhagavān evam āha anekaparyāyeṇāyuṣmann āntarāyikā dharmāḥ santa āntarāyikā
K01prmosufu:69: evoktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā alam antarāyāyeti //
K01prmosufu:70: niḥsṛja tvam āyuṣmann idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam evaṃ cet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir
K01prmosufu:71: ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api
K01prmosufu:72: trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api
K01prmosufu:73: trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamāṇas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
K01prmosufu:75: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.56 yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathāvādinaṃ pudgalam akṛtānudharmāṇam
K01prmosufu:76: apratiniḥsṛṣṭe tasmin pāpake dṛṣṭigate ālapet saṃlapet saṃvaset saṃbhuṃjīta tena
K01prmosufu:78: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.57 śramaṇoddeśaś cāpy evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam
K01prmosufu:79: ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā tena pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti
K01prmosufu:80: sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa evaṃ
K01prmosufu:81: vocas tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā
K01prmosufu:82: pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣu na sādhu bhavati bhagavato
K01prmosufu:83: 'bhyākhyānaṃ na ca punar bhagavān evam āha anekaparyāyeṇa ya ... āntarāyikāḥ kāmāḥ
K01prmosufu:84: santa āntarāyikā evoktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā alam antarāyāyeti niḥsṛja
K01prmosufu:85: tvam āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam evaṃ cet sa śramaṇoddeśo
K01prmosufu:86: bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed
K01prmosufu:87: dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya
K01prmosufu:88: dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamāṇas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ
K01prmosufu:89: kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ adyāgreṇa
K01prmosufu:90: te āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa nāsau bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāstā
K01prmosufu:91: vyapadeṣṭavyo nāpy anyatamānyatamo vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ
K01prmosufu:92: samanubaddhavyo yad apy anye śramaṇoddeśā labhante kaścid asya bhikṣor muhūrtam apy
K01prmosufu:93: asparśo bhaviṣyatīty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:94: {on p. 7 = FE 10.3-7, 9.1-3 again parts of Pāy. 57,
K01prmosufu:96: } labhante bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ dvirātraparamaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ sāpi te 'dyāgreṇa nāsti cara pareṇa mohapuruṣa naśya tvaṃ //
K01prmosufu:97: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇoddeśam upasthāpayed upalāḍayet tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:98: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.58 na ca cīvarapratilambhād bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamad
K01prmosufu:99: durvarṇīkaraṇaṃ nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā kaṣāyaṃ vā anādāya ced bhikṣus trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām
K01prmosufu:100: anyatamānyatamaḥ durvarṇīkaraṇaṃ nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā kaṣāyaṃ vā navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:101: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.59 yaḥ punar bhikṣu ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā svahastam udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhayed vā anyatrādhyārāmagatād vā adhyāvāsagatād vā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:106: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.65 yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:107: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.66 yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣayed bhīṣāpayed vā anantato hāsyaprekṣy api pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:108: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.67 yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣor vā bhikṣuṇyā vā śikṣamāṇāyā vā śrāmaṇerakasya
K01prmosufu:109: vā śrāmaṇerikāyā vā pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā śikyaṃ vā saritaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā anyatamānyatamaṃ
K01prmosufu:110: vā śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāram upanidadhyād upanidhāpayed vānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:111: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.68 yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoś cīvaram vā datvā tataḥ paścād apratyuddhārya paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:112: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.69 yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭo dveṣād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ bhikṣum anāpannam amūlakena saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayet pāyantikā
K01prmosufu:113: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.70 yaḥ punar bhikṣur apuruṣayā striyā sārdham adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā // //
K01prmosufu:114: uddānam* // steyonaviṃśati khanet pravāraṇā śikṣitavyaṃ kalahānāṃ tūṣṇīṃ viprakrāmed anādarāt surāpānam akāle ca // //
K01prmosufu:115: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.71 yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ steyasārthena sārdham adhvamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:116: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.72 yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnaviṃśativarṣaṃ pudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvāyopasaṃpādayet pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:117: sa ca pudgalo 'nupasaṃpannas te ca bhikṣavo garhyā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ //
K01prmosufu:118: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.73 yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khanet khānayed vā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:119: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.74 cāturmāsikī bhikṣuṇā pravāraṇā svīkartavyā anyatra samayāt pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:120: tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ pratyekapratyekapravāraṇā punaḥ punaḥ pravāraṇā atyarthapravāraṇā nityapravāraṇā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ //
K01prmosufu:121: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.75 yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamāno syāt te āyuṣmaṃ cchikṣāyāṃ
K01prmosufu:122: śikṣitavyaṃ sa evaṃ vaden nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bālānāṃ mūḍhānām avyaktānām akuśalānāṃ vacanenāsyāṃ
K01prmosufu:123: śikṣāyāṃ śikṣiṣye yāvan nāham anyān bhikṣūn prakṣyāmi sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān iti pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:124: ājñātukāmena bhikṣuṇā tasyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkādharā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ //
K01prmosufu:125: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy 76 yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ viharatāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ
K01prmosufu:126: vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam āpannānāṃ tūṣṇīm aupaśrutikayā tiṣṭhed yad ete bhikṣavo vakṣyanti
K01prmosufu:127: tad ahaṃ śrutvā tathā tathānuvyahariṣyāmīty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:128: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.77 yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃghasya dharmyāyāṃ viniścayakathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ tūṣṇīṃ viprakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:131: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.80 yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle grāmaṃ praviśet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā // ṛ //
K01prmosufu:132: uddānam* sabhojane 'ruṇe dānīṃ sūcīgṛhakapādakāḥ nahyān niṣadanaṃ kaṇḍū śāṭī sugatacīvaraṃ // ṛ //
K01prmosufu:133: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.81 yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sabhojane kule upanimantritaḥ pūrvabhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ
K01prmosufu:134: kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeta santaṃ gṛhiṇam anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā //
K01prmosufu:135: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pāy.82 yaḥ punar bhikṣur anirgatāyāṃ rajanyām anudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu
K01prmosufu:136: ratneṣu vā ratnasaṃmateṣu vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasyaindrakīlaṃ vā indrakīlasāmantakaṃ vā samabhiḥ ///
K01prmosufu:137: Pay.Schl. pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tuṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi // //
K01prmosufu:138: uddānam // grāmam antargṛhaṃ caiva śaikṣāṇy āraṇyakena ca prātideśyāni coktāni buddhena hitavādinā // //
K01prmosufu:139: ime punar āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti
K01prmosufu:140: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pratid.1 yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikāyā bhikṣuṇyā rathyāgatāyā grāmaṃ piṇḍāya
K01prmosufu:141: carantyā antikāt svahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya khāded bhuñjīta vā tena
K01prmosufu:142: bhikṣuṇā bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyam garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ
K01prmosufu:143: sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmy ayaṃ dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ //
K01prmosufu:144: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pratid.2 bhikṣavaḥ khalu saṃbahulāḥ kuleṣūpanimantritā bhuṃja tatra ced
K01prmosufu:145: bhikṣuṇī vyapadiśati sthitā syād iha khādyakaṃ dehi iha odanaṃ dehi iha sūpikaṃ dehi
K01prmosufu:146: iha bhūyo dehīti sā bhikṣuṇī tair bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyā āgamaya tāvat tvaṃ
K01prmosufu:147: bhagini muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇī yāvad ime bhikṣavo bhuṃjate ekabhikṣor api cen na pratibhāyantāṃ
K01prmosufu:148: bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vaktuṃ sarvais tair bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīya bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā
K01prmosufu:149: bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyaṃ vayam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpannā āsātmyaṃ
K01prmosufu:150: pratideśanīyaṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmo 'yam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ
K01prmosufu:151: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pratid.3 yāni tāni saṃghasya śaikṣāṇi kulāni bhavanti śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmatāni //
K01prmosufu:152: yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasya śaikṣeṣu kuleṣu śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmateṣu pūrvam
K01prmosufu:153: apravāritaḥ san upasaṃkramya svahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya khāded bhuṃjīta
K01prmosufu:154: vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyam asmy
K01prmosufu:155: āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmy ayam
K01prmosufu:157: (PrMoSū-LCh)Pratid.4 yāni tāni saṃghasyāraṇyakāni śayanāsanāni bhavanti sāśaṃkasaṃmatāni sabhayasaṃmatāni sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmatāni //
K01prmosufu:158: yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasyāraṇyakeṣu śayanāsaneṣu sāśaṃkasaṃmateṣu sabhayasaṃmateṣu
K01prmosufu:159: sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu sarvam apratisaṃvidite vane bahir ārāmasya khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
K01prmosufu:160: pratigṛhyānte ārāmasya khāded bhuṃjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ
K01prmosufu:161: garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmy
K01prmosufu:163: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā dharmās tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi
K01prmosufu:164: kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosufu:165: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi // //
K01prmosufu:166: uddānaṃ // nivāsanena sapta syus trayaś copari cīvare saṃvṛtodguṇṭhikollaṃghikayā kāyena + + + // //
K01prmosufu:167: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti //
K01prmosufu:168: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.1 parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
K01prmosufu:169: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.2-7 nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ nātyapakṛṣṭaṃ na hastiśuṇḍakaṃ na tālavṛndakaṃ na kulmāṣapiṇḍakaṃ na nāgaśīrṣakaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
K01prmosufu:170: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.8 parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
K01prmosufu:171: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.9-10 nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ nātyapakṛṣṭaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
K01prmosufu:172: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.11-15 susaṃvṛtā supraticchannā alpaśabdā anutkṣiptacakṣuṣo yugamātradarśino 'ntargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
K01prmosufu:173: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.16-20 nodguṇṭhikā notkṛṣṭikayā notsaktikayā na vyastikayā na paryastikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
K01prmosufu:174: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.21-25 nollaṃghikayā nojjaṃghikayā notkuṭukikayā na nikuṭotkuṭukikayā na khaṃbhākṛtā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā
K01prmosufu:175: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.26-30 na kāyapracālakaṃ na bāhupracālakaṃ na śīrṣapracālakaṃ nāṃsotḍhaukikayā na hastasaṃlagnikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā // //
K01prmosufu:176: uddānaṃ kuryān na viniṣatsyāmīty aṣṭau cāpi pratigrahe paṃca catus sapta paṃca satkṛtyādi tu bhojane // //
K01prmosufu:177: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.31 nānanujñātā antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
K01prmosufu:178: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.32-39 nāpratyavekṣyāsanaṃ sarvakāyaṃ samavadhāya na pāde pādam ādhāya
K01prmosufu:179: na gulphe gulpham ādhāya na sakthani sakthi ādhāya na saṃkṣipya pādau na vikṣipya
K01prmosufu:180: pādau na viḍaṃgikayā antargṛha āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
K01prmosufu:181: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.40 satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
K01prmosufu:182: (PrMoSū-LCh)Śai.41-43 na samatittikaṃ samasūpikaṃ sāvadānaṃ pātrasaṃjñinaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
